CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
OldVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows. This feature was rolled back to address some critical user feedback; we apologize for any inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
OldVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows. This feature was rolled back to address some critical user feedback; we apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
OldVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Containers in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Containers are a powerful tool for organizing and managing complex diagrams. Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to use containers in Visio for the web to create professional-looking diagrams that are easy to understand and navigate.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva content in Workplace Search
CurrentVersion.description: Users searching from Microsoft Search surfaces will be able to find content from Answers in Viva that match their search. Note: This release is being cancelled as we will bring better value better value to the customer through Viva Engage content as interleaved results in Roadmap 391669. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Answers in Viva content in Workplace Search
OldVersion.description: Users searching from Microsoft Search surfaces will be able to find content from Answers in Viva that match their search.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
OldVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing webinar for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing webinar for simplified event creation
OldVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new webinar by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ability to duplicate an existing town hall for simplified event creation
OldVersion.description: Organizers can schedule a new town hall by duplicating information from an existing scheduled one. This includes duplicating information such as details, presenters, theming, and more. The organizer can also edit and update the information as needed for the new event.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connected actions - Viva Pulse integration into Viva Insights Leader deep dive reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Leaders can send Viva Pulse surveys tailored to new out-of-the-box reports from the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams at anytime to add additional context to workplace metrics.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connected actions - Viva Pulse integration into Viva Insights Leader deep dive reports
OldVersion.description: ,Leaders can send Viva Pulse surveys tailored to new out-of-the-box reports from the Viva Insights app in Microsoft Teams at anytime to add additional context to workplace metrics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K display UI scaling for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: 4K-enabled displays, including front of room displays and touch boards, are natively supported on the Teams Rooms experience. Additional disclosure: 4K video is not supported.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 4K display UI scaling for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: 4K-enabled displays, including front of room displays and touch boards, are natively supported on the Teams Rooms experience. Additional disclosure: 4K video is not supported.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings with a QR code on Teams Rooms on Windows using Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Users can quickly join a meeting from a Teams Room even without forwarding the invite to the room calendar by scanning a QR code using their native mobile camera. The user will then enter the Teams mobile companion mode experience on their mobile. The QR code is found on the Teams Room home screen and can also be scanned to start an ad-hoc meeting or cast content from their mobile to the Teams Room display. If the user does not have the Teams mobile app, they will be directed to download it after scanning the QR code. IT admins can control the QR code feature in the device settings and the Teams admin center. This feature supports cross-tenant meetings when the organization settings and user policies allow it.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings with a QR code on Teams Rooms on Windows using Teams mobile
OldVersion.description: Users can quickly join a meeting from a Teams Room even without forwarding the invite to the room calendar by scanning a QR code using their native mobile camera. The user will then enter the Teams mobile companion mode experience on their mobile. The QR code is found on the Teams Room home screen and can also be scanned to start an ad-hoc meeting or cast content from their mobile to the Teams Room display. If the user does not have the Teams mobile app, they will be directed to download it after scanning the QR code. IT admins can control the QR code feature in the device settings and the Teams admin center. This feature supports cross-tenant meetings when the organization settings and user policies allow it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Customization and preview of email notifications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification is getting advanced customization options: 1. Extensive Token Support which provides precise details to end users using the expanded token library. 2. DLP Exchange rule matched email attachment control to choose to include/exclude matched email as an attachment in end-user notifications. 3. Tailored Email Content to customize the sender display name and email body using HTML, markdown, or plain text. 4. Ability to preview the email notification to ensure it meets your requirements.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Customization and preview of email notifications
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention end-user email notification is getting advanced customization options: 1. Extensive Token Support which provides precise details to end users using the expanded token library. 2. DLP Exchange rule matched email attachment control to choose to include/exclude matched email as an attachment in end-user notifications. 3. Tailored Email Content to customize the sender display name and email body using HTML, markdown, or plain text. 4. Ability to preview the email notification to ensure it meets your requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

OldVersion.title: Visio: Define Shape Data in Visio for the web
OldVersion.description: Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to harness the full potential of shape data in Visio for the web. This powerful feature enables users to create custom data fields and associate them with shapes, simplifying the process of tracking and analyzing information in their diagrams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams Meetings will take the meeting chat into account
CurrentVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in Teams Meetings a question, it will use the chat and transcript as the source.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Teams Meetings will take the meeting chat into account
OldVersion.description: When you ask Copilot in Teams Meetings a question, it will use the chat and transcript as the source.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
OldVersion.description: ,Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New Banner web part (updated title area) in SharePoint Pages and News
OldVersion.description: We’ve made some improvements to the title area on top of the page experience. 1 – Title area is removable now, which is no longer required on your page. 2 – Rebranded the title area as a Banner web part with new layouts! You can add one or more banner(s) to any column of your page, including a full-width section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Open a Teams Meeting chat
CurrentVersion.description: For meetings that are created as Teams Meetings, users now have the option to open the Teams Meeting chat directly from the meeting event on their Outlook mobile calendar. Selecting that option will open the chat in Teams or tell the user to get the Teams app.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Open a Teams Meeting chat
OldVersion.description: For meetings that are created as Teams Meetings, users now have the option to open the Teams Meeting chat directly from the meeting event on their Outlook mobile calendar. Selecting that option will open the chat in Teams or tell the user to get the Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance Security Copilot - Contextual Summarization
OldVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
OldVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
OldVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Image shapes
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding the capability to apply a shape over the image web part as well as on inline images in the text web part. Shapes include square, circle, triangle, hexagon, pebble, and teardrop.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Image shapes
OldVersion.description: ,We're adding the capability to apply a shape over the image web part as well as on inline images in the text web part. Shapes include square, circle, triangle, hexagon, pebble, and teardrop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
OldVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: School Connection –  Providing access to parents via their phone number
CurrentVersion.description:
The School Connection app in Microsoft Teams (mobile) empowers parents and guardians to engage, support, and monitor their student's learning at school. This release enables a parent/guardian to get access to their child’s profile in School Connection if they login to Teams (mobile) with their phone number and the school has registered that phone number as a parent/guardian contact. Additionally, a parent/guardian will easily get access to their child’s profile if the phone number or email address that is registered by the school is saved as a contact information in their Microsoft account. Learn more about School Connection at the link below.
More info: https://parent.microsoft.com/

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
OldVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
CurrentVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams premium feature usage report for administrators in Teams admin center (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Premium feature usage report in the Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC) will help administrators understand the usage of various Teams Premium features across users in their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for iOS. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updating Conversation Actions on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs. With this update, you will also be able to access all conversation actions from the inbox view by long-pressing a message.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for Android. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to send dual- and triple-language surveys in emails
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now supports sending survey emails in multiple languages within a single mailer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting recordings will be saved to meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business
CurrentVersion.description: With this change Teams meeting recordings will be saved to the meeting organizer’s OneDrive for Business instead of to the OneDrive for Business folder of the person who initiated the recording. This improves the compliance of recordings as meeting organizers can then manage access permissions and recording file management.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Pick a local folder for saving attachments
CurrentVersion.description: Users are now able to pick a folder when saving an attachment in the new Outlook for Windows. This feature was rolled back to address some critical user feedback; we apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.description: ,Communication Compliance introduces the Security Copilot feature to generate contextual summaries of long messages in the context of the conditions that flagged the messages as potentially risky. Investigators can pinpoint the potentially risky content in the message and understand the premise of the entire message with just one click of a button. In addition to contextual summaries, users can ask additional questions in an open text prompt for deeper insight on the message content.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Access Copilot directly in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: ,The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get from the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com ("Work mode"), and in many other places is now available from within classic Microsoft Outlook for Windows. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Easily manage Do Not Disturb presence status when screen sharing
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing a setting that allows Teams Phone Mobile users to opt-out of your presence automatically transitioning to Do Not Disturb when presenting or screen sharing. When this setting is enabled, users will be able to continue to receive call notifications when presenting, without having to manually adjust their presence status.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Admins/ Global admins do not require license to manage Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Provide Engage admins and Global admins the ability to manage Viva Engage without a licensed account.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Sensitive information processing model
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Premium users will now have the capability to apply a prebuilt sensitive information processing model to SharePoint libraries. This model is designed to detect and possibly extract sensitive information from documents upon their library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: ,Viva Connections will support Viva Pulse cards where admins can add Pulse cards to the Connections Dashboard. Users can create a Pulse survey from the Connections Dashboard. Users of the Connections Dashboard will be notified about Pulse surveys they send as well.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Image shapes
CurrentVersion.description: We're adding the capability to apply a shape over the image web part as well as on inline images in the text web part. Shapes include square, circle, triangle, hexagon, pebble, and teardrop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Attach files from SharePoint Sites in the mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to browse, multiselect and attach files from SharePoint Sites to a chat or channel conversation in the mobile app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Interactivity analytics
CurrentVersion.description: This feature gives audience engagement metrics on interactive Stream videos. Users with edit access to a Stream video that contains links, polls, or callouts will be able to see the number of unique viewers and the percentage of those who viewed or clicked on interactive elements in the video, as well as average number of interactions and average attention time. These metrics help video owners understand which content is most engaging.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Simplified App Control policy creation experience (curated workflow)
CurrentVersion.description: Configure an App Control policy with built-in toggles in the console that expose all App Control for Business capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: School Connection –  Providing access to parents via their phone number
CurrentVersion.description:
The School Connection app in Microsoft Teams (mobile) empowers parents and guardians to engage, support, and monitor their student's learning at school. This release enables a parent/guardian to get access to their child’s profile in School Connection if they login to Teams (mobile) with their phone number and the school has registered that phone number as a parent/guardian contact. Additionally, a parent/guardian will easily get access to their child’s profile if the phone number or email address that is registered by the school is saved as a contact information in their Microsoft account. Learn more about School Connection at the link below.
More info: https://parent.microsoft.com/

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New expanded gallery view option for minimized meeting window
CurrentVersion.description: When meeting window is minimized, participants can enlarge the small view of Teams meeting to a new bigger gallery view, making it easier to multitask on screen and stay aware of meeting events. Users can choose the size of the minimized gallery view window from the following options: one participant visible in the minimized window, 4 participants visible in the minimized window, fully minimized, or fully expanded.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Compliance boundary cmdlet tool for managing compliance boundary property
CurrentVersion.description: This cmdlet allows users to verify the compliance boundary property of a specific OneDrive site, ensuring that the value is correctly configured. If the property is not set or if the site is in arbitration, users can use this cmdlet to assign the property value for the site for compliance boundary to take effect.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams premium feature usage report for administrators in Teams admin center (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Premium feature usage report in the Microsoft Teams admin center (TAC) will help administrators understand the usage of various Teams Premium features across users in their organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updated conversation actions on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for iOS. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Updating Conversation Actions on Outlook for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Currently, when viewing a message, you can access the available actions in the top-right corner. We are updating these actions to be at the bottom of the screen with the ability to customize the order and placement of the actions to suit your needs. With this update, you will also be able to access all conversation actions from the inbox view by long-pressing a message.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Adding search to settings on Outlook for Android
CurrentVersion.description: We recently rolled out updated settings on Outlook for Android. To make the settings experience even better, we are now adding the ability to search within settings so that you can find exactly what you're looking for.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to send dual- and triple-language surveys in emails
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now supports sending survey emails in multiple languages within a single mailer.
